General.Name: Maschinenfabrik HEID AG
General.Description: Maschinenfabrik HEID AG engages in the manufacture and wholesale of machinery in Austria and internationally. The company offers machine tools and spare parts for lathes, and related services. It also engages in real estate marketing and leasing activities, as well as investment management activities. Maschinenfabrik HEID AG was founded in 1883 and is headquartered in Stockerau, Austria.

0.Name: Senator Günter  Rothenberger
0.Title: Sole Member of the Management Board
